user_query: I'm a web developer and I need to parse some data for a project. Can you assist me with parsing the data using the 5ka_Porocila API? Additionally, I want to check the health status of the API to ensure it's functioning properly. Finally, find me the details of a specific domain name using the DOMAINE nc API.

TaskList.description: Check the health status of the 5ka_Porocila API to ensure it's functioning properly.
Parse the required data using the 5ka_Porocila API once the health status is confirmed.
Find the details of a specific domain name using the DOMAINE nc API.
